attributes.action: Bank Holiday for William and Kate's baby
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the success of the Royal Wedding, Jubilee and Olympic's of the last few years, 2013 needs another reason to celebrate and William and Kate have delivered. Not only will this be a chance for the country to come together and celebrate as one but it also offers huge financial incentives.

What better reason to celebrate than the birth of the child of the nations favourite couple. They've continuously delivered for us, its now time for the people to deliver for them.
